attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To have a new National anthem for ENGLAND - preferably JERUSALEM. 
The Scots Welsh & Irish have their own anthems and are completely disrespectful to 'God Save the Queen'
very apparent at sporting events.
Why should the English have an out-dated and dull anthem which covers the whole of Britain.
Most English I know wnat nothing more than to be seperated from the 3 other UK countries, they are tired of the hostility towards the English,recent polls about Scots becoming completely independent showed that more English voted for that the the Scots themselves!!

rejection.details: The title of the petition should ask for an action, please reword.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
